thread.title: The This Is Us Fan Theory About Jack's Death Is Absolutely Heartbreaking
thread.title_full: The This Is Us Fan Theory About Jack's Death Is Absolutely Heartbreaking

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: The This Is Us Fan Theory About Jack's Death Is Absolutely Heartbreaking
text:
This Is Us, the NBC show your mom sobs to every Thursday night, has a mystery baked into it. It's that Jack, the father of the triplets, played by Milo Ventimiglia, is dead. We get to know him through flashbacks to the 80s, but we know he's not alive in the present. But what we don't know is how he died; what happened?
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Hello Giggles points us to the fan theory that Jack died on 9/11.
http://just-an-outlaw.tumblr.com/post/156202168931/i-just-read-the-best-theory-on-jacks-death However, the site also points out, there's a major hole in this theory:
http://just-an-outlaw.tumblr.com/post/156650213826/thisisusbestshowever-thisisdefinitelyus But who knows, maybe there will be a twist to explain that twist!? This Is Us has plenty of surprises up its sleeves, so don't count a heartbreaking 9/11 twist out.
Follow Laura on Twitter .
